T02D2182:38a-1: badzra p'a ni n'i l'amba ra dha ra ho tri bi dhi:/
T02D2182:38a-3: phyag na rdo rje gos sngon po can gyi sbyin
T02D2182:38a-4: sreg gi cho ga / dpal gos sngon can la
T02D2182:38a-5: phyag 'tshal lo // man ngag rim pa dran tsam zhig / slob ma'i don du bshad par bya //
T02D2182:38a-6: sngon du bsnyen pa rdzogs pa yis //
T02D2182:38a-7: sgrub pa yi ni dus dag tu //
T02D2182:38a-8: sbyin sreg dag gis gsad par bya //
T02D2182:38a-9: sa brtag bslang zhing sbyang ba dang //
T02D2182:38a-10: byin gyis brlab cing bsrung ba dang //
T02D2182:38a-11: snying po dag tu bya mi dgos //
T02D2182:38a-12: mandala gru gsum lho phyogs bstan ;
T02D2182:38a-13: / khru gang tshad la phyed brkos nas //
T02D2182:38a-14: gsum dor gsum ni kha khyer ro //
T02D2182:38a-15: bdud rtsi sogs tshon nag por bya //
T02D2182:38a-16: de dbus rdo rje steng yang de //
T02D2182:38a-17: bar du me ri rtse mo 'phags //
T02D2182:38a-18: bud shing gnag cing gdug pa'i shing //
T02D2182:38a-19: thab kyi tshad las sor mtho tsam //
T02D2182:38a-20: yam shing de mthun bcu gnyis tshad //
T02D2182:38b-0: @38b mchod rdzas nag po la sogs shis //
T02D2182:38b-1: sreg rdzas mar nag rus khrag sha //
T02D2182:38b-2: skye tshe shang tshe yungs kar dang //
T02D2182:38b-3: de la sogs pa'i thun rdzas bya //
T02D2182:38b-4: rdzas de rnams kyis gzugs brnyan bya //
T02D2182:38b-5: mchod rdzas g-yas la sreg rdzas g-yon //
T02D2182:38b-6: byin gyis brlab cing gzhag par bya //
T02D2182:38b-7: dgang gzar blugs gzar gzhan dang mthun //
T02D2182:38b-8: yang na lag pa dag gis bya //
T02D2182:38b-9: de gnyis rdo rje dril bu yang //
T02D2182:38b-10: mdun nyid du yang gzhag par bya //
T02D2182:38b-11: bzang ngan de ni bya mi dgos //
T02D2182:38b-12: las kyi bum pas thams cad bsad //
T02D2182:38b-13: dus ni nam phyed nyin phyed bya //
T02D2182:38b-14: rgyan cha gon la lho phyogs blta //
T02D2182:38b-15: g-yon brkyang 'dug ste drag tu bzlas //
T02D2182:38b-16: mche ba gtsigs shing khro gnyer bsdu //
T02D2182:38b-17: dang po bskyed pa sngon song nas //
T02D2182:38b-18: me sbar brtag cing bgegs bzlog bya //
T02D2182:38b-19: bzang na de ni bya mi dgos //
T02D2182:38b-20: tha mas sbyang zhing bskyed pa dang //
T02D2182:38b-21: cho ga gsum dang skad cig mas //
T02D2182:38b-22: me lha nag po khros pa bskyed //
T02D2182:38b-23: ye shes me lha spyan drangs bstim //
T02D2182:38b-24: gnyis su med par rgyas btab la //
T02D2182:38b-25: me lha'i sngags la mchod sngags btags te dbul //
T02D2182:38b-26: de nas sreg rdzas dbul bar bya //
T02D2182:38b-27: de dag dbul ba'i man ngag kyang //
T02D2182:38b-28: khro bo dag gi cho 'phrul gyis //
T02D2182:38b-29: gzugs brnyan dgug bstim gtubs te dbul //
T02D2182:38b-30: yang na rdzas mchod mnyes pa las //
T02D2182:38b-31: 'od zer khro bas dgug cing bsreg / man ngag de la nan tan bya //
T02D2182:38b-33: che ge mo m'a ra ya phat /
T02D2182:38b-34: stong rtsa brgyad nas brgya rtsa brgyad //
T02D2182:38b-35: nyi shu rtsa gcig bar du'o //
T02D2182:38b-36: yang na bsod nams dag gi rim pa yis //
T02D2182:38b-37: brgya dang stong dang khri ru bya //
T02D2182:38b-38: de ltar byas pas de gsod cing //
T02D2182:38b-39: khyad par du ni 'byung po gsod //
T02D2182:38b-40: tha ma dgang blugs bstod bya'o //
T02D2182:38b-41: de yi thugs kar gos sngon bskyed //
T02D2182:38b-42: ye shes sems dpa' spyan drang bstim //
T02D2182:38b-43: rgyas btab mchod pa gong bzhin dbul //
T02D2182:38b-44: de nas sreg rdzas rim bzhin dbul //
T02D2182:38b-45: rtsa sngags nyid kyis dbul bar bya //
T02D2182:38b-46: gong gi man ngag shes par bya //
T02D2182:38b-47: dgang blugs phul la bstod par bya //
T02D2182:38b-48: phrin las bcol zhing gshegs su gsol //
T02D2182:38b-49: ting 'dzin bsdus te me lha bsang //
T02D2182:38b-50: rdzas rnams thams cad bsdus nas ni //
T02D2182:39a-1: yi lha la dbul zhing bstod pa bya //
T02D2182:39a-2: phrin las bcol zhing gshegs su gsol //
T02D2182:39a-3: ting 'dzin bsdus te spyod lam bya //
T02D2182:39a-4: slob ma rnams kyi don ched du //
T02D2182:39a-5: bdag gis man ngag 'di bkod pas //
T02D2182:39a-6: slob dang sems can thams cad kyang //
